snippet: Michigan’s governor recommended Kevyn D. Orr, a lawyer who worked on Chrysler’s bankruptcy, to be Detroit’s first emergency manager.
abstract: Michigan Gov Rick Synder chooses Kevyn D Orr, lawyer who worked on Chrysler’s bankruptcy, to be Detroit’s first emergency manager; Orr will be granted sweeping powers to remake city's financial plan, change labor contracts and sell city assets.

byline.contributor: Mary M. Chapman contributed reporting from Detroit, and Steven Yaccino from Chicago.

lead_paragraph: Michigan’s governor recommended Kevyn D. Orr, a lawyer who worked on Chrysler’s bankruptcy, to be Detroit’s first emergency manager.

headline.seo: Detroit Gets Kevyn Orr as Emergency Manager
headline.main: Bankruptcy Lawyer Is Named to Manage an Ailing Detroit
headline.print_headline: Bankruptcy Lawyer Is Named to Rescue Detroit From Fiscal Disaster
